mapper.insert: insert into busdata0526 (line_no, date, start_station, end_station, direction, duration, period) values (#{lineNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{direction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{period,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select line_no, date, start_station, end_station, direction, duration, period from busdata0526
